River.Cottage.Veg.S01E04.WS.PDTV.XviD-BARGE

Release Date: 11-07-2011
Air Date: 11-06-2011
Broadcast Channel: CHANNEL 4

Video: 624x352 @ 25.000
Audio: VBR MP3 Avg 128

Link: http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-29710

Notes: This is a statement to the person who wrote
Note.to.BARGE.Nice.Webrips.READNFO.WS.PDTV.XviD-GOODWORK

We record about 100 shows every week and over a year it adds
up to about 4TB of HDTV and PDTV recordings and although BARGE
and the other existing UK TV groups do a great job preing
most of them, a increasing percentage of them never get
pred. This is known as a backlog of shows as there isn't
enough time for BARGE or the other groups to pre them at a
certain time.

We decided to go through every recording and only pre whole
series or single episodes that would complete a existing pred
series. If we did them all we would be preing until Xmas!

We could of just deleted all the recordings and forgot about
it, but this would be a shame to all those series with
missing episodes within them.

None of them were Webrips and we only resort to Webrips if
theres absolutely no other alternative, to complete a
very popular series.


We are currently looking for legit 100mbit+ sites
to affil.
